messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What does Yog-Sothoth grant its slaves in return for their worship?
The ability to command various monsters from distant worlds.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What does Tawil at’Umr allow its users to do?
Travel to distant times and places safely.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is a risk of dealing with Tawil at’Umr?
Tawil at’Umr may remove its veil and cause utter madness and destruction.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the nature of the power granted by Yog-Sothoth?
The power to see into other planes or travel between planes via magic.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the nature of the power granted by Tawil at’Umr?
The power to travel to distant times and places safely.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is Yog-Sothoth's power to travel within the planes?
to reach any other time or space
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is Yog-Sothoth's other name, indicating its role as the Gate?
the Key
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the correct Arabic form of 'Umr at'Taw-il, Yog-Sothoth's aspect as Opener of the Way?
Tawil at'Umr
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What speeds can Yog-Sothoth fly through our atmosphere?
hundreds or thousands of miles per hour
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is Yog-Sothoth called?
the Key and the Gate
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the correct Arabic form of 'Prolonged of Life'?
Tawil at'Umr
You are a helpful AI assistant.
At what speeds can Yog-Sothoth fly through our atmosphere?
hundreds or thousands of miles per hour
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many attacks does Yog-Sothoth have per round?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to a character touched by Yog-Sothoth's spheres?
they immediately lose 3D10 CON, with possible permanent damage
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to a body part touched by Yog-Sothoth?
It takes the form of corrosion, withering, or corruption of the body part touched.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the cost of using Yog-Sothoth's bolts of silvery fluid or fire?
1D6 magic points
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the effect of Yog-Sothoth's energy sphere?
It covers an area about 5 yards across with its effect.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What damage does Yog-Sothoth's bolts cause?
Death in a 5-yard diameter
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Can Yog-Sothoth be damaged with non-magical weapons?
No, only magical weapons may damage Yog-Sothoth.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the area affected by a gout of energy?
about 5 yards across
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to characters within a 5-yard diameter of a gout of energy?
they are damaged to death
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What material can damage Zoth-Ommog?
magical weapons
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How does Zoth-Ommog transport characters?
by touching them
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the cost of seeing Zoth-Ommog in its Tawil at'Umr form?
no cost
